clause: Indeed's Recruitment Privacy Policy Other Languages: Français, Québécois, Deutsche, 日本語, Italiano, Português, Nederlands, Español, Polski Welcome Indeed’s core mission is to help people get jobs.
label: none

clause: There are plenty of reasons to come work with us.
label: none

clause: Indeed values the trust our candidates place in us when they give us access to their personal data.
label: none

clause: This Recruiting Privacy Policy describes how we work to maintain that trust and protect that information.

clause: We’ve recently updated our Recruiting Privacy Policy to ensure we clearly explain how we collect and use personal and non-personal data.
label: none

clause: Here’s a summary of key updates: We have made changes to the structure and layout of our Privacy Policy to make it easier to read and understand.
label: none

clause: We have added more detail about the information we collect, how we use personal data and the legal bases we rely upon to use personal data.

clause: We have added more information about data transfers.

clause: If you wish to object to any new notified processing, you can contact us at privacy-dept@indeed.com.

clause: Introduction This Privacy Policy details how we collect, use, and disclose the personal and non-personal data we collect from and about you when you access or use our online and/or mobile websites, applications, services, and software, interact with us on the phone or in person, or, where permitted by applicable law and in line with this Privacy Policy, that we obtain from publicly available sources or third-party sources.
label: data_sharing

clause: Indeed has a responsibility to protect and preserve the private information of every candidate for a role with Indeed, and we take that responsibility seriously.
label: none

clause: This Privacy Policy is provided by Indeed, Inc.
label: none

clause: and its affiliates (‘Indeed’) to inform candidates for roles with Indeed about our activities relative to the handling of personal data concerning candidates (‘candidate personal data’).
label: none

clause: This Privacy Policy covers all individuals applying for roles at Indeed or who have expressed a positive interest in a position with Indeed, including applications for all types of permanent and non-permanent positions.
label: none

clause: 1.1 Who is Responsible for Your Information The primary applicable data controller will be the Indeed entity that intends to/enters the employment contract or contract for services with the candidate.

clause: 2.2 Candidate Personal Data Provided by Third Parties Indeed may also collect information about you from third parties or public sources as needed to support our recruitment process.
label: none

clause: For example, before your employment or appointment with Indeed, we may collect information from appropriate social media sources for recruitment purposes.
label: none

clause: We also may conduct background screenings through a third-party service provider and collect information about your past education, right to work, employment, credit, and/or criminal history, where permissible and in accordance with applicable law.
label: data_sharing

clause: Alternatively, third parties may refer or recommend you to our recruiters.
label: none

clause: 2.3 Retention of Your Candidate’s Personal Data Indeed and its affiliates may retain the information you provide in your application in order to permit Indeed to contact you in the future with respect to other positions for which you may be suitable.
label: none

clause: If you become an employee of Indeed, this information will become part of your employment record.
label: none

clause: Otherwise, we retain such data until it is no longer necessary to fulfill the purpose it is being used for, as required by applicable laws,  or until you ask us to delete it.
label: none

clause: Please note, Indeed might have a legal obligation to retain certain personal data from your job application for a period of time as mandated by the laws in your location.
label: none

clause: You can learn more about the retention period for each country here.

clause: Please refer to sections 3.2 and 3.3 of this privacy policy for more details on third-party service providers and other third parties with which we may share your candidate’s personal data.
label: data_sharing

clause: Who We Share Your Data With Indeed will not share or otherwise disclose a candidate’s personal data for purposes unrelated to those detailed in this privacy policy without the prior consent of the candidate.
label: data_sharing

clause: To that end, Indeed will take reasonable precautions to allow access to candidate personal data to only those Indeed employees, agents, contractors, or similar entities to the extent necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy policy.
label: none

clause: Such disclosures of personal data in the course of the recruitment process will usually involve the transfer of candidate personal data to countries outside of where the information was originally collected (including countries outside the European Economic Area).
label: none

clause: All such transfers are performed in full compliance with applicable data protection rules and subject to appropriate safeguards, primarily through the use of extensive data protection agreements.
label: none

clause: Please refer to section 4.0 of this privacy policy for more information about the transfer of your candidate’s personal data to foreign countries.
label: none

clause: In compliance with CCPA, we affirm that we do not have actual knowledge of selling or sharing the personal information of consumers, including of those under 16 years of age.
label: none

clause: We do not use or disclose sensitive personal information unless reasonably necessary and only for purposes permitted by CCPA, including but not limited to performance of services and user security.
label: none

clause: 3.1 Transfers of Your Candidate’s Personal Data Between Indeed Affiliated Entities Candidate’s personal data may be disclosed among various affiliated companies within Indeed for the purposes set out in this privacy policy.
label: none

clause: 3.2 Transfers of Your Candidate’s Personal Data to Certain Third-Party Service Providers In the course of our recruitment activities, Indeed may make certain candidate’s personal data available to third parties who provide services to us to support those activities.
label: data_sharing

clause: Indeed will only do so where such a transfer is necessary, and in accordance with applicable data protection rules.
label: none

clause: Your personal data may be made available to the following types of service providers: companies that help with relocation support services, companies that provide payroll support services, companies that help with verification/background checking services, companies that help with candidate experience surveys, cloud services companies that provide hosting, data storage, and other services pursuant to standard terms and conditions that may be non-negotiable companies that help improve Indeed services to candidates.
label: employment_checks

clause: These third parties may provide data points including how much time you spend on specific pages, which links you choose to click, and data that helps determine user preferences.
label: none

clause: This information enables us to build and maintain our services with user feedback.
label: none

clause: These third parties may use cookies and other technologies to collect data on your behaviour and devices such as the device type, browser information, and preferred language.
label: tracking

clause: companies that help manage candidates’ recruitment life cycle via cloud-based recruitment software solutions.
label: none

clause: These are known as applicant tracking systems (ATS).
label: tracking

clause: These service providers may change over time but we will always use trusted service providers who will handle your personal data in a manner consistent with this privacy policy and in accordance with applicable law.
label: none

clause: 3.3 Transfers of Your Candidate’s Personal Data to Other Third Parties In addition to section 3.2, Indeed may also disclose your candidate’s personal data to other third parties in certain limited circumstances, including (but not limited to): to comply with our legal obligations; to establish, exercise or defend against potential, threatened or actual litigation; where necessary to protect Indeed, your vital interests, or those of another person; or in connection with the sale, assignment or other transfer of all or part of our business.
label: none

clause: Please contact privacy-dept@indeed.com if you would like to get more information on these third parties.
label: none

label: none

clause: Exercising Your Rights Depending on your location you may have rights available to you with respect to your candidate’s personal data held by Indeed.
label: none

clause: These may include: the right to rectify your candidate’s personal data or/and your application; the right to object to or restrict the processing of your candidate’s personal data; the right to object to automated processing, including decision-making and profiling, which produce a legal effect or similarly significant effects; the right to request access to and portability of your candidate’s personal data; and the right to request deletion of your candidate’s personal data; the right to object or opt out of your personal data being sent to a third party [excluding vendors who act as our service provider] / controller; the right to be free from any retaliation or discriminatory treatment for exercising your rights with respect to your candidate’s personal data.
label: data_sharing

clause: If you want to request that any of these rights be actioned in relation to your personal data, please complete this form.
label: none

clause: Such rights of rectification, objection, restriction, access, portability, and deletion are subject to certain limitations, as provided for by applicable laws.
label: none

clause: Individual requests will be completed within the time allotted by relevant laws and regulations, which starts to run from the point of Indeed confirming your request.
label: none

clause: Where permitted, please note there may be a charge for subsequent requests from the same individual, which will be determined by Indeed and only imposed to the extent permitted by applicable law.
label: none

clause: You can update and amend the application information you submitted by completing this form.
label: none

clause: You can also withdraw your application at any time by logging in to your account.
label: none

clause: When you request access to your candidate’s personal data, these will be sent to the email address associated with your user account, in a readable format.
label: none

clause: When you request the deletion of your candidate’s personal data, any in-flight or in-progress applications will be canceled and your user profile information will be deleted.
label: none

clause: Indeed verifies all requests through email before actioning them and reserves the right to deny a request where we are unable to verify your identity satisfactorily.
label: none

clause: Authorized Agent You may use an authorized agent to submit a request on your behalf.
label: none

clause: Indeed may require that you provide the authorized agent with written permission.
label: none

clause: Indeed will verify the identity of the authorized agent before actioning the request and any request may be denied if it cannot be verified.
label: none

clause: To submit a request on your behalf an authorized agent can use this form.
label: none

clause: Automated processing Indeed may perform automated processing of candidate’s personal data in the context of pre-screening questions.
label: none

clause: Where we perform this processing, we do so either on the basis of consent or performance of a contract.
label: none

clause: Where it occurs, such processing is subject to the safeguards detailed in this Privacy Policy to protect your privacy and, if you are entitled by law to do so based on your location, you may contact privacy-dept@indeed.com to obtain human intervention and/or contest any decision generated by said automated processing.
label: none

clause: 7.1 How we use Artificial Intelligence or “AI” Indeed’s mission is to help people get jobs, including jobs at Indeed.
label: none

clause: In support of this mission, we use personal data to develop, train, build, and use statistical models, including artificial intelligence (“AI”), to improve some of our products and candidate experiences.
label: none

clause: We use AI to help find suitable candidates for roles at Indeed.
label: none

clause: We use your personal data, including profile information and activity data to find suitable candidates for internal roles and to invite you to apply to those roles.
label: none

clause: These AI features help us connect with you over potential employment opportunities within Indeed.
label: none

clause: We also use AI to filter, sort and match applicants who have applied to roles at Indeed.
label: none

clause: We may use AI to generate a summary of your application and to provide our recruiters with a generalized match rating of applications received.
label: none

clause: Indeed processes personal data including application data to generate these summaries for the purpose of assisting our recruiters.
label: none

clause: The personal data processed for these purposes is limited to what is necessary for generating application insights and supporting screening decisions.
label: none

clause: For more information on how Indeed uses AI please see our Privacy Center and Indeed’s AI Principles.
label: none

clause: Contacting Indeed We welcome your data protection questions.
label: none

clause: For more information about how we handle your personal data, please contact us.
label: none

clause: Contact Indeed Privacy by Email: To reach us by e-mail, please contact: privacy-dept@indeed.com.
label: none

clause: Contacting Indeed Privacy by Telephone: California residents may call our designated toll-free telephone number at: +1 (800) 616-6535 9.
label: none

clause: Complaints and Disputes Indeed takes your data protection questions and concerns seriously, and we are committed to resolving complaints about our collection or use of your data.
label: none

clause: If you believe your data protection rights have been infringed, we encourage you to contact our Data Protection Officer by sending an email to privacy-dept@indeed.com.
label: none

clause: You may also have the right to complain to the appropriate data protection supervisory authority.
label: none
